Name: Hatchpunk
About the game: Unknown creatures have occupied the Earth and devastated the streets of cities. A lone hero comes out of cover to give the monsters a good fight. Does he have a chance to change the situation? Gameplay: Use gun and chainsaw to kill various monsters in distant and close combat. Collect an arsenal of powerful weapons with different impact on enemy creatures. Play in various locations with different content. Kill enemies in close combat with chainsaw to regain your health. Freely use the grapple hook to overcome obstacles. Enjoy unique visual style of the game!
